CreateApiTemplate.title: CreateApiTemplate
CreateApiTemplate.summary: Creates a predefined API operation template. The template contains information about an API operation, including the basic structure, request method, URL path, request parameters, and response format.

CreateCluster.title: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.summary: Creates a pay-as-you-go or subscription cluster.

CreateScript.title: CreateScript
CreateScript.summary: Adds a bootstrap action or a common script of an E-MapReduce (EMR) cluster.

CreateUsers.title: CreateUsers
CreateUsers.summary: Creates multiple users at a time.

DecreaseNodes.title: DecreaseNodes
DecreaseNodes.summary: Performs a scale-out operation on the target node group.

DeleteScript.title: DeleteScript
DeleteScript.summary: Deletes a bootstrap action or a common script of an E-MapReduce (EMR) cluster.

DeleteUsers.title: DeleteUsers
DeleteUsers.summary: Deletes multiple users at a time.

GetApiTemplate.title: GetApiTemplate
GetApiTemplate.summary: Queries the detailed configuration information about an API operation template.

GetApplication.title: GetApplication
GetApplication.summary: Retrieves the details of an application.

GetAutoScalingActivity.title: GetAutoScalingActivity
GetAutoScalingActivity.summary: Queries the information about an auto scaling activity.

GetCluster.title: GetCluster
GetCluster.summary: Obtains the details of a cluster.

GetClusterCloneMeta.title: GetClusterCloneMeta
GetClusterCloneMeta.summary: Obtains metadata of the E-MapReduce (EMR) cluster that you want to clone. This helps you call the CreateCluster API operation to quickly create an EMR cluster.

GetDoctorApplication.title: GetDoctorApplication
GetDoctorApplication.summary: Obtains job analysis information on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

GetDoctorComputeSummary.title: GetDoctorComputeSummary
GetDoctorComputeSummary.summary: Obtains the information about resource usage in a cluster on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

GetDoctorHBaseCluster.title: GetDoctorHBaseCluster
GetDoctorHBaseCluster.summary: Obtains the metrics of an HBase cluster.

GetDoctorHBaseRegionServer.title: GetDoctorHBaseRegionServer
GetDoctorHBaseRegionServer.summary: Obtains the information about an HBase region server.

GetDoctorHDFSCluster.title: GetDoctorHDFSCluster
GetDoctorHDFSCluster.summary: Obtains the analysis results of the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) storage resources of a cluster on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

GetDoctorHDFSDirectory.title: GetDoctorHDFSDirectory
GetDoctorHDFSDirectory.summary: Obtains the analysis results of a specific Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) directory of a cluster. The depth of the directory is not greater than five.

GetDoctorHiveCluster.title: GetDoctorHiveCluster
GetDoctorHiveCluster.summary: Obtains the analysis results of a Hive cluster.

GetDoctorHiveDatabase.title: GetDoctorHiveDatabase
GetDoctorHiveDatabase.summary: Obtains the analysis results of a Hive database.

GetDoctorHiveTable.title: GetDoctorHiveTable
GetDoctorHiveTable.summary: Obtains the analysis results of a specific Hive table in a cluster on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

GetDoctorJob.title: GetDoctorJob
GetDoctorJob.summary: Obtains the basic running information about a job on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

GetDoctorReportComponentSummary.title: GetDoctorReportComponentSummary
GetDoctorReportComponentSummary.summary: Obtain the analysis result report of a specified component from EMR Doctor.

GetNodeGroup.title: GetNodeGroup
GetNodeGroup.summary: You can call this operation to obtain the details of a node group.

GetOperation.title: GetOperation
GetOperation.summary: Gets the details of an asynchronous operation.

JoinResourceGroup.title: JoinResourceGroup
JoinResourceGroup.summary: Adds an EMR resource to a resource group. A resource can belong to only one resource group.

ListApiTemplates.title: ListApiTemplates
ListApiTemplates.summary: Queries a list of API operation templates.

ListApplicationConfigs.title: ListApplicationConfigs
ListApplicationConfigs.summary: Queries the configurations of the application.

ListAutoScalingActivities.title: ListAutoScalingActivities
ListAutoScalingActivities.summary: Queries a list of auto scaling activities.

ListComponentInstances.title: ListComponentInstances
ListComponentInstances.summary: Retrieves the list of component instances.

ListDoctorApplications.title: ListDoctorApplications
ListDoctorApplications.summary: Obtains the analysis results of multiple jobs on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

ListDoctorComputeSummary.title: ListDoctorComputeSummary
ListDoctorComputeSummary.summary: Obtains the information about resource usage by resource type in a cluster on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

ListDoctorHBaseRegionServers.title: ListDoctorHBaseRegionServers
ListDoctorHBaseRegionServers.summary: Obtains the information about multiple HBase RegionServers at a time.

ListDoctorHBaseTables.title: ListDoctorHBaseTables
ListDoctorHBaseTables.summary: Obtains the information about multiple HBase tables at a time.

ListDoctorHDFSDirectories.title: ListDoctorHDFSDirectories
ListDoctorHDFSDirectories.summary: Obtains the analysis results of multiple Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) directories at a time on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor. The depth of directories is not greater than five.

ListDoctorHDFSUGI.title: ListDoctorHDFSUGI
ListDoctorHDFSUGI.summary: Obtains the analysis results of Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) storage resources for multiple owners or groups at a time on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

ListDoctorHiveDatabases.title: ListDoctorHiveDatabases
ListDoctorHiveDatabases.summary: Obtains the analysis results of multiple Hive databases at a time.

ListDoctorHiveTables.title: ListDoctorHiveTables
ListDoctorHiveTables.summary: Obtains the analysis results of multiple Hive tables at a time on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

ListDoctorJobs.title: ListDoctorJobs
ListDoctorJobs.summary: Obtains the basic running information about multiple jobs at a time on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

ListDoctorJobsStats.title: ListDoctorJobsStats
ListDoctorJobsStats.summary: Obtains the summary of basic running information about multiple jobs at a time on E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor.

ListDoctorReports.title: ListDoctorReports
ListDoctorReports.summary: Obtains the overall analysis result reports of E-MapReduce (EMR) Doctor at a time.

ListNodeGroups.title: ListNodeGroups
ListNodeGroups.summary: Queries the list of node groups in an EMR cluster.

ListNodes.title: ListNodes
ListNodes.summary: Queries the node list of an EMR cluster.

ListScripts.title: ListScripts
ListScripts.summary: Query EMR cluster bootstrap scripts or regular scripts.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are bound to an EMR cluster.

PutAutoScalingPolicy.title: PutAutoScalingPolicy
PutAutoScalingPolicy.summary: Adds a custom auto scaling rule.

RunApplicationAction.title: RunApplicationAction
RunApplicationAction.summary: Manages a service deployed in a cluster. For example, you can call this operation to start pr stop a service.

RunCluster.title: RunCluster
RunCluster.summary: Creates a pay-as-you-go or subscription E-MapReduce (EMR) cluster.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Binds tags to a specified EMR cluster.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Unbinds tags from a specified column in an EMR cluster. If the tag is not bound to other resources, the tag is automatically deleted.

UpdateScript.title: UpdateScript
UpdateScript.summary: Updates a bootstrap action or a common script of an E-MapReduce (EMR) cluster.

UpdateUserAttribute.title: UpdateUserAttribute
UpdateUserAttribute.summary: Updates the information about a user.
